title: DP Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins Guest Hosting
itunes:title: DP Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Ryan, filling in for Dan, talk about the huge upset in the Kentucky Derby as Rich Strike won the race as an 80-1 underdog.  Doug and Ryan discuss the 76ers' series-tying win over Miami Sunday night and how well James Harden did in that win. Ryan explains why he thinks Mark Jackson is a no-brainer for the Lakers to hire as head coach.  Plus, Ryan and Doug talk about the viral videos from the weekend involving Martin Brundle at the F1 race in Miami. 

 

#DougGottliebShow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
